headline: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation (CTSH) To Transform Global Workplace Services For Leading Vehicle Maker
summary: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation (NASDAQ:CTSH) is among the 10 Best Magic Formula Stocks for 2026. On February 24, the company announced that it had been selected by a leading vehicle maker to transform its global workplace services. This will be a multi-year collaboration to enhance and modernize the manufacturer’s global facilities through artificial intelligence and […]
